mapper.sql: CARD_SUPPLE_ID, USHER_ID, CARD_SUPPLE_STATE, CARD_SUPPLE_DATE, CARD_SUPPLE_START_WORK_TIME, CARD_SUPPLE_END_WORK_TIME, CARD_SUPPLE_RESION, CARD_SUPPLE_IMG, CARD_SUPPLE_PROCESS_USER_ID, CARD_SUPPLE_PROCESS_USER_NAME, CARD_SUPPLE_CREATETIME, CARD_SUPPLE_PROCESS_TIME, CARD_SUPPLE_REJECT_RESION, CARD_SUPPLE_DELETE_FLAG
mapper.select: SELECT CS.*, U.USHER_NAME FROM T_CARD_SUPPLE CS JOIN T_USHER U ON CS.USHER_ID = U.USHER_ID WHERE U.ORG_ID = #{orgId} ORDER BY CS.CART_SUPPLE_CREATETIME DESC

SELECT CARD_SUPPLE_ID ID, CARD_SUPPLE_PROCESS_TIME PROCESS_TIME, CONCAT( DATE_FORMAT( CS.CARD_SUPPLE_CREATETIME, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' ), '', '补卡申请',if(CS.CARD_SUPPLE_STATE=20,"通过","驳回") ) TITLE, 'CARD_SUPPLE' TYPE FROM T_CARD_SUPPLE CS WHERE CS.CARD_SUPPLE_DELETE_FLAG=0 AND (CS.CARD_SUPPLE_STATE=20 OR CS.CARD_SUPPLE_STATE=30) AND CS.USHER_ID=#{uherId} UNION ALL SELECT WORK_SUPPLE_ID ID, WORK_SUPPLE_PROCESS_TIME PROCESS_TIME, CONCAT( DATE_FORMAT( WS.WORK_SUPPLE_TIME, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' ), '', '加班申请',if(WS.WORK_SUPPLE_STATE=20,"通过","驳回") ) TITLE, 'WORK_SUPPLE' TYPE FROM T_WORK_SUPPLE WS WHERE WS.WORK_SUPPLE_DELETE_FLAG=0 AND (WS.WORK_SUPPLE_STATE=20 OR WS.WORK_SUPPLE_STATE=30) AND WS.USHER_ID=#{uherId} ORDER BY PROCESS_TIME DESC
SELECT CS.*, U.USHER_NAME FROM T_CARD_SUPPLE CS JOIN T_USHER U ON CS.USHER_ID = U.USHER_ID WHERE CS.CARD_SUPPLE_ID=#{cardSuppleId}
